amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the long title, add the following new section: "SEC.__. No funds made available by this Act shall be used to condemn land.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to condemn land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
